hypothesis_content.title: Ethereum Beta Amplification on Bitcoin Catalyst
hypothesis_content.statement: When Bitcoin experiences a strong positive catalyst (e.g., ETF inflow spike, institutional adoption news) causing BTC to rise >2% in 2 hours during a BULL regime, ETH will outperform BTC by an additional 1-3% over the next 6 hours as beta-chasing capital rotates into the largest altcoin.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In bull markets, positive BTC catalysts create risk-on sentiment that amplifies through the ecosystem. ETH, as the highest-liquidity altcoin, acts as the primary beta play. Traders and algorithms systematically rotate profits from BTC gains into ETH.
entry_conditions: BTC rises >2% within 2 hours on identifiable positive catalyst
Total crypto market cap excluding BTC shows positive flow

exit_conditions.take_profit: ETH/BTC ratio increases by 2% from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: ETH/BTC ratio decreases by 0.8% from entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: ETH fails to outperform BTC in more than 60% of such catalyst events during bull regimes, or underperforms by more than 0.5% on average.
